item.title: RedisCX
item.description: When you search for a redis client tool in github, there are already some tools like Redis Desktop Manager, Medis and so on.But as the moment I use this tools, there are some troubles in searching key in large-size db, crude ui and inhuman operation.So I make my redis client tool, and hope you enjoy using it! See More Detail

item.title: ZooKeeperCX
item.description: A cross-platform succinct smart ZooKeeper GUI Client. See More Detail
